unnormalised: Entertainment Alert! Is Bollywood's darling, Alia Bhatt, expecting baby no. 2? Sources close to the "Brahmastra" actress say she's been spotted leaving Lilavati Hospital multiple times this week.

unnormalised: And speaking of Brahmastra, rumors are swirling that Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif secretly met up at Karan Johar's Diwali party! Awkward much? Eyewitnesses claim they kept their distance, but you know how these things go!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, in other news, superstar Shah Rukh Khan was seen treating his son, Aryan, to a fancy dinner at Wasabi by Morimoto after Aryan wrapped up filming his directorial debut. Daddy-son goals, right?

unnormalised: And hold up, is that Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha vacationing in the Maldives… again? Looks like their love story is still going strong! More updates soon, folks. Stay tuned for all the masala! This is entertainment, desi style!
